channel.title: Nets's Help Topic 1
channel.description: If you need help with anything regarding private server coding/making, feel free to use this thread as a resource. I consider myself an advanced coder. *pokes sig*

item.title: Nets's Help Topic 1
item.dc:creator: @metalus89 metalus89
item.description:
@metalus89 wrote:

no you are not supposed to leave compile.bat open because it starts the server on its own. just close it and then open runserver.bat and leave it open.

Read full topic

item.title: Nets's Help Topic 1
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

antireversil:

Ok, I port forwarded my router, made exceptions into the ports on windows firewall and my internet one, i have no-ip on, and i have runserver on. What else is there?

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49714.0.html. If my tutorial doesn’t help you, please refer to a different user to help your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Nets's Help Topic 1
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

NPCHandler.java:562: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) {
^

  • Add if after else.
    NPCHandler.java:623: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
    }
    ^
  • add else if/if/else
    NPCHandler.java:1464: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
  • add else if/if/else[br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 08:24:43 PM[/size][hr] I’m back to help people out.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

[quote=“gungamma, post:22, topic:34534”]Thanks lol but now it all works but now i cant even trade the person i spawned out with the shop and all.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 09:57:00 PM[/size][hr]tried adding http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49261.0.html and got Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:500) at server.main(server.java:48) for runserver.bat.

AND: NPCHandler.java:562: 'else' without 'if' } else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) { ^ NPCHandler.java:623: 'class' or 'interface' expected } ^ NPCHandler.java:1464: 'class' or 'interface' expected ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . . for compile.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 11:05:48 PM[/size][hr]lol im a mess, talk to you tommorow.[/quote]

Dude, you got the same error before but for a different line. The whole point of my topic is to help people LEARN too. Take a look at how I fixed your other problems and you’ll see how.

Read full topic

item.title: Nets's Help Topic 1
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

shop = 47@yel@Gilded_Shop[quote=“gungamma, post:20, topic:34534”]alright i added shop and i got a new error, heres where it looks like at my shops shop = 47 @yel@Gilded_Shop 1 1 3488 200000 3486 200000 3485 200000 3483 200000 3481 200000

heres the runserver.bat error: Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 200000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29) i tried one tabbed got error tried 2 tabbed got same error, so can you send me the correct way it should look, not in coded form or else it looks like this shop = 47 @yel@Gilded_Shop 1 1 3488 200000 3486 200000 3485 200000 3483 200000 3481 200000 then it gets too confusing, hope you can help like always![br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 08:55:03 PM[/size][hr]And about the not server working, umm i kinda have the same problem so i have to use hamachi, i have no-ip running i have port right and ip right i just still cant log in, only to 127.0.0.1 or localhost, and i dont think i can port forward im using Ewire, which is connected to my laptop which gives wireless internet to my other computers for my family.[/quote]

The amount for sale in a shop can only be up to 5 digits. You tried to put 200000 so I replaced it with 20000 and fixed up the tabbing (it was wrong).

Try to replace this with your last shop code: shop = 47 @yel@Gilded_Shop 1 1 3488 20000 3486 20000 3485 20000 3483 20000 3481 20000

Then try to tab up the numbers so it looks like the other shop codes.

I would like some reward/award for this? I answered like 3 of your questions.

Read full topic

item.title: Nets's Help Topic 1

item.description:
@gungamma wrote:

alright i added shop and i got a new error, heres where it looks like at my shops shop = 47 @yel@Gilded_Shop 1 1 3488 200000 3486 200000 3485 200000 3483 200000 3481 200000

heres the runserver.bat error: Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 200000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29) i tried one tabbed got error tried 2 tabbed got same error, so can you send me the correct way it should look, not in coded form or else it looks like this shop = 47 @yel@Gilded_Shop 1 1 3488 200000 3486 200000 3485 200000 3483 200000 3481 200000 then it gets too confusing, hope you can help like always![br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 08:55:03 PM[/size][hr]And about the not server working, umm i kinda have the same problem so i have to use hamachi, i have no-ip running i have port right and ip right i just still cant log in, only to 127.0.0.1 or localhost, and i dont think i can port forward im using Ewire, which is connected to my laptop which gives wireless internet to my other computers for my family.

Read full topic

item.title: Nets's Help Topic 1
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

antireversil:

ok, i have compile.bat opened, and runserver opened. I have disable ZoneAlarm Firewall, and have made the exception for port 43594. I’ve also edited my router as explained in Mod taharoks server guide. What else could be stopping my server from being online?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 08:23:36 PM[/size][hr]is my compile supposed to stay opened?. cuz when i runserver it says error unable to startup listener on port 43594-port already in use?

Close your compiler when you try to run your server. If it still doesn’t work, try ALSO port forwarding to port 5555. That should fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Nets's Help Topic 1
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

iceman21:

61 errors =] when i added the }

Take off the } and replace else if (NPCID == 534) { //mod island shop by aaa801 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; }[/ with if (NPCID == 534) { //mod island shop by aaa801 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; }

It should work now! ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 07:53:46 PM[/size][hr][quote=“gungamma, post:14, topic:34534”]so, you dont know whats wrong?[/quote]

The thing that is wrong that since you didn’t have enough time to add everything it said, there really is no point of having it because the code can not work just from one line missing. Understand where I’m at?

Read full topic

client.java:10441: cannot find symbol symbol : variable examination location: class client examination = newExamine; ^ client.java:10446: cannot find symbol symbol : variable examination location: class client sendMessage("It is now: " +examination); ^ client.java:10455: cannot find symbol symbol : variable examination location: class client p.examination = "This is a player."; ^ client.java:18364: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerexamining location: class client playerexamining = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); ^ client.java:18365: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerexamining location: class client client theplayer = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerexami ning]; ^ client.java:18367: cannot find symbol symbol : variable examination location: class client sendMessage("Their examination reads: " +theplayer.examination); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. item.title: Nets's Help Topic 1
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

[quote=“gungamma, post:8, topic:34534”]anyways i got a new source and i added some new shops and i got 1 Error its very small error, on the other hand this isnt perminate im still trying to fix my old server, but i wanna fix this one too so i can use both, check out “A wish list” in this forum. anyway heres the new error i got.

client.java:16792: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PutNPCCords location: class client PutNPCCords = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

and ill post where i added that phrase one min.[/quote]

Okay, I can wait.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 07:35:36 PM[/size][hr][quote=“gungamma, post:8, topic:34534”]anyways i got a new source and i added some new shops and i got 1 Error its very small error, on the other hand this isnt perminate im still trying to fix my old server, but i wanna fix this one too so i can use both, check out “A wish list” in this forum. anyway heres the new error i got.

client.java:16792: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable PutNPCCords
location: class client
        PutNPCCords = true;
        ^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

this is where i added it in client.java:if (PutNPCCoords == true) { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; } [WHAT I ADDED]else if (NPCID == 537) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 46; }[ENDING OF WHAT I ADDED] break;[/quote]

Ah, I see. You put PutNPCCords instead of PutNPCCoords which is the correct variable.

Read full topic

item.title: Nets's Help Topic 1
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

[code][quote=“iceman21, post:5, topic:34534”][code]} else if (NPCID == 851) { //Gnome foods
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 46; //Gnome foods

else if (NPCID == 534) { //mod island shop by aaa801
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 43;
}
} else if (NPCID == 596) { //Fat tony foods
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 46; //Fat tony shop
[/code] there u go[/quote]
First of all, if you haven’t already done so, press enter after:

WanneShop = 46; //Fat tony shop[/code] and add a } there to close up the code. Then try it and post the result.

Read full topic
